programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.desc: Roast vegetables and fruit Caroline Dumas uses her baking trays to cook a bumper batch of vegetables and fruit for the freezer. The aim? To make those weekday meals quicker and easier to prepare. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: The wild Cévennes: guardians of biodiversity We set our heading for the north of the department of the Hérault, gateway to the Cévennes National Park, a Unesco-listed world heritage site since 2011. Here everything depends on a fragile balance, that between man, nature and animals. Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Bundt cake and madeleines
Using the same vanilla-flavoured cake mixture, Ricardo prepares two different desserts: a marbled mocha Bundt cake and green tea and frosted lemon madeleines.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc: The Renaissance in the Loire Valley The Loire Valley has a deep and enduring connection with the French Renaissance. Known throughout the world for its prestigious châteaux, its dense forests and the River Loire itself, often described as France's only major untamed river, the Loire Valley is also a pillar of contemporary history. Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Nice doggie Beware, beware! Before going to pat a dog it is important to remember the advice offered by Anne Chardonnens, an activity leader in the PAM bite prevention programme.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Making waffles
25 March is International Waffle Day. Not a date Rocky is likely to forget, he's determined to make it a veritable feast!
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Les Enfants du désordre
programme.desc:
Locked-up for eight months on drugs charges, Marie watches a drama production in prison. Her sentence has only four months left to run. An actress with whom she immediately feels an affinity offers the possibility of a conditional discharge, with the help of the Théâtre du Fil company...

Directed by: Yannick Bellon (France, 1989)

Cast: Emmanuelle Béart, Robert Hossein, Patrick Catalifo  

Genre: Drama

programme.title: Alex Hugo
programme.desc:
A winter's girl
The entire population of the village, threatened by an avalanche, is evacuated. As he prepares to head down to the valley, Alex discovers a terrified young woman hiding in a chalet. Apparently killers are after her, wanting her eliminated. Meanwhile, heavily armed men approach on snow bikes...
Directed by: Pierre Isoard (France, 2021) Screenplay: Julien Guérif, Pierre Isoard Cast: Samuel Le Bihan (Alex Hugo), Lionnel Astier (Angelo Batalla), Fabien Baïardi (Tony Leblanc), Fanny Valette (Chris), Adama Niane (frère Frédéric), Loïc Houdré (Jean Fargeot) Genre: detective Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: À la vie, À la Terre - Congo : des arbres et des hommes
programme.desc:
The Democratic Republic of Congo shelters a vast tropical forest, a biodiversity reservoir and the planet's second largest green lung. Its peatlands form an inestimable underground treasure at risk of deterioration. Today, beyond Congolese borders, these lands in need of preservation constitute a common good whose future is in question.
Presented by: Chloé Nabédian.

programme.title: Les pays d'en haut
programme.desc:
Episode 3

The vaccines brought back by Arthur are nearly all past their expiry dates. Donalda has a suggestion for Cyprien, one that could solve the problem. The epidemic hits Oscar with devastating results. And who is the thief prowling the village, attacking Lacour the shopkeeper and notary Le Potiron?

Directed by: Yan England (season 5, Canada, 2020)

Screenplay: Gilles Desjardins, based on the work by Claude-Henri Grignon

Cast: Vincent Leclerc (Séraphin), Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse (Donalda), Maxime Le Flaguais (Alexis), Antoine Bertrand (Antoine Labelle), Rémi-Pierre Paquin (Bidou), Julie Le Breton (Délima), Marie-Éve Milot (Rosa-Rose), Roger Léger (Cyprien), Claude Despins (Jos), David La Haye (Caron)

Genre: drama

programme.title: Les pays d'en haut
programme.desc:
Episode 4

Rosa-Rose has also been a victim of the thief. Séraphin appoints Bidou as royal detective, in order to find the culprit. Father Caron profits from Délima's distress to have a regulation voted that makes alcohol illegal in Sainte-Adèle. Alexis proposes a strategy to compel the population to be vaccinated.

Directed by: Yan England (season 5, Canada, 2020)

Screenplay: Gilles Desjardins, based on the work by Claude-Henri Grignon

Cast: Vincent Leclerc (Séraphin), Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse (Donalda), Maxime Le Flaguais (Alexis), Antoine Bertrand (Antoine Labelle), Rémi-Pierre Paquin (Bidou), Julie Le Breton (Délima), Marie-Éve Milot (Rosa-Rose), Roger Léger (Cyprien), Claude Despins (Jos), David La Haye (Caron)

Genre: drama

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
On the trail of the slag heaps

Certain regions are carried by a history that changed them dramatically and imposed a strong identity. Such is the case of the Nord, its recent history indelibly marked by coal. We explore the area around Douai, where garden cities rub shoulders with the red-brick cathedrals of the mining towns.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 325 Alors que Marilyn accueille un nouveau colocataire chez elle, Mo tente de protéger sa fille. Claire, elle, fait une étrange découverte... Réalisation : Pascal Roy, Émilie Barbault, Sarah Barbault, Virginie Verrier (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Teilo Azaïs (Enzo), Fabrice Deville (Florent), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Bertrand Farge (Victor), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Benjamin Bourgois (Alex), Marie-Clotilde Ramos-Ibanez (Sofia), Jérémy Banster (Julien), Élisabeth Margoni (Marilyn), Mélanie Robert (Manon), Shirley Bousquet (Laetitia) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
